i have an 18 year old son.

i play games at the arcade , still.

content.text: Hey there! What are your hobbies?
I like to play games at the arcade, still. I'm from a small town in the Midwest.
That's cool. I'm from a small town in the Midwest too. I like comic books.
I love comic books! My husband and I go to comic book conventions every year.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to go to a comic book convention.
You should! They're so much fun. You get to meet all sorts of interesting people and see all sorts of cool things.
You should! What's your favorite comic book?
My favorite comic book is X-Men.
X-Men is great! I love the X-Men. I have a lot of X-Men comics.
Me too! I have a whole collection of X-Men comics.
